string-array.item: World Most Popular Search Engine: Google Search (Google.com)
The Richest Man Ever: Mansa Musa of Mali, Estimate Worth of $400 billion
The Richest Man in the World: Carlos Slim
World Richest Woman: Liliane Bettencourt (11th Richest in the world)
World First Car: Benz Patent - Motorwagen
World Highest Rated University: Harvard University
World most Popular Currency: United States Dollar
The country with the Highest Population : China
The Richest Country in the World: Qatar (G.D.P is $1,34,871.95)
The Founder of the World Wide Web: Sir Tim Berners (1989) - Lee
The most powerful country in the world: United States of America
The biggest country in the world (Landmass): Russia (17,075,200 sq.km)
The Fastest Car in the World : Venom GT (290.49 MPH)
The most Popular Mobile Operating System in the World: Android Operating System
